txt_en: When life's path is steep, keep your mind even.
txt_cn: 纵使前路坎坷，亦要沉着冷静。

txt_en: The biggest risk is not taking any risk at all.
txt_cn: 不去冒险，才是最大的风险。

txt_en: There's a song for every dream.
txt_cn: 每个梦想都值得被歌颂。

txt_en: I should move on and seize the day.
You are not gone because you will always be in our hearts.
txt_cn: 只要心里想念，爱的人便不会离开我们。

txt_en: Sometimes we need to lose something before we can understand its value.
txt_cn: 总有一些东西，失去后方知其可贵。

txt_en: Don't be disappointed if there's not a pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.
txt_cn: 就算期望落空，也不要丧失希望。

txt_en: The only thing predictable about life is its unpredictability.
My personal failure has always strengthened my resolve to make things right.
txt_cn: 失败没有击垮我，反而激励了我。

txt_en: People shouldn't have to live up to other people's expectations.
txt_cn: 无需活在别人的期望里。

txt_en: It is better to have loved and lost than to never have loved at all.
txt_cn: 即便会失去，也不能丧失爱的勇气。

txt_en: This is a blessing in disguise.
txt_cn: 人生多无常，福祸总相依。

txt_en: You got a dream; you gotta protect it.
txt_cn: 如果你有梦想，就要去捍卫它。

txt_en: Faith is taking the first step when you can't see the staircase.
txt_cn: 信念，是前路迷茫时，毅然迈出的第一步。

txt_en: A real loser is somebody that's so afraid of not winning; they don't even try.
txt_cn: 真正的失败，是还没尝试就畏缩。

txt_en: When you smile, the world lights up.
You can make a new start.
